```{r, out.width="80%"}
pies<-read.csv("pie-survey.csv")
pielist<-table(pies$What.is.your.favorite.kind.of.pie)
print(pielist)
barplot(pielist)
barplot(pielist, 
        col=c("red","blue","green","orange","purple"))
pie(pielist,
    col=c("red","blue","green","orange","purple"))

```
